ing: 2 teaspoons half-and-half cream, or to taste
1 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste
des: "Why spend extra money on seasonal flavored coffee when you can easily make your own?"
ins: Mix the ground coffee, allspice, and cinnamon in a small bowl, and place into the filter of a drip coffee maker. Pour 4 cups of water into the coffee maker, and turn on the machine. When coffee has finished dripping, pour into 2 cups. Stir in cream and sugar to taste.
